title: 13(3) of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 21 of 2022), hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2024.

title: 13(3) of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 21 of 2022), hereby order
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 3 of the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 3 of the 
Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 21 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 June, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [302] 3

title: 13(3) of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 21 of 2022), hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of section 3 of the Child Care 
(Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 21 of 2022) with effect from 1st July 2024. Section 
3 amends the Child Care Act 1991 (the Principal Act) by inserting a definition 
of the Data Protection Regulation into section 2(1), that is, the interpretation 
section, of the Principal Act. 

The following sections of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2022 came into 
effect on 21st September 2022 following the making of S.I. No. 464/2022 - Child 
Care (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022: sections 1, 4, 6 and
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) order provides commencement section 3 child care (amendment) act 2022 (no 21 2022) effect 1st july 2024 section 3 amends child care act 1991 (the principal act) inserting definition data protection regulation section 2(1) interpretation section principal act following section child care (amendment) act 2022 came effect 21st september 2022 following making s.i no 464 2022 - child care (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022 section 1 4 6
